news.title: The sobering way most Americans plan to use their tax refunds this year
news.summary: Tax refunds are projected to be larger on average this year. Americans are thinking hard about how to spend them. The average tax refund will be $1,300, according to the IRS.

news.title: United Airlines’ best loyalty perks will soon be reserved for its cardholders. Is the card worth it?
news.summary: Frequent flyers who hold a United Airlines co-branded credit or debit card can soon earn up to twice as many miles as noncardholders. The move will reward the airline's biggest spenders.

news.title: 8 ways you may be squandering money in retirement
news.summary: Expenses that made sense during your peak earning years can drain your resources once you stop working. Expenses that make sense now can drain resources later in life.
